column5: Lovingly renovated dairy barn on family owned/operated cattle ranch approximately 8 miles north of Weatherford. 800 square foot house. 1 BR with king sized bed and 1 BA. 2 fishing ponds and beautiful setting on 130 acres. Central heat/air, fire pit and BBQ grill.
column8: CHARMING! Renovated barn 8 miles N of Weatherford
